title: Winter Artisan Market
location: Tretower Court and Castle
location_search: Tretower Court and Castle
info: Join us here at Tretower for some retail therapy at our annual winter market. With the house filled with local artists, designers and makers you can enjoy the beautiful medieval house as you browse the unique handmade artisan arts and crafts. Free admission and parking.
name: Cadw

title: Remembrance Sunday
location: Castell Coch
location_search: Castell Coch
info: Come to Castell Coch, and learn about Cardiff during the war, hear about how the castle was used during WW2. Poppy craft activity for children, and colouring-in activities available.
name: Cadw

title: The Ice Rink & Ice Walk
location: Cardiff Castle, Castle Street, Cardiff CF10 3RB
location_search: Cardiff Castle  Castle Street  Cardiff CF10 3RB
info: Cardiff's Winter Wonderland Ice Rink & Ice Walk, the capital’s biggest Winter attraction, is back at Cardiff Castle from 15th Nov – 8th Jan!
name: Cardiff Caste

title: Brother Thomas The Cellarer
location: Tintern Abbey
location_search: Tintern Abbey
info: Step back in time with Brother Thomas and learn what life was like as a monk in Tintern Abbey. Our sympathetic brother will give you inside information about the monks’ rituals and responsibilities. As the cellarer of Tintern Abbey, Brother Thomas (a Cistercian monk) will be able to tell you all there is to know (and perhaps some things you shouldn’t know!) about the workings of the abbey, his fellow monks, the lay brothers and other ‘less religious’ people!
name: Cadw

title: Christmas Starts Here!
location: Raglan Castle
location_search: Raglan Castle
info: Put on your Christmas jumper and get into the festive spirit with us! Seasonal refreshments and a visit from the man himself! Christmas starts here!
name: Cadw

title: Let's Discover… Medicine In The North Pole
location: Chepstow Castle
location_search: Chepstow Castle
info: Meet Dr Frost, chief medical officer of the North Pole, who will explain all the medical problems that Father Christmas has to face when delivering Christmas cheer. From altitude sickness (it’s a long way up in that sleigh), to the effects of too many mince pies and biscuits. Learn how to keep warm like Santa as well! This is a drop-in event with no need to book.
name: Cadw

title: Penarth Christmas Lights Switch On
